Package kea.exercise.hogwartsstudentadmin.edu.hogwarts.service

Class CourseServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
kea.exercise.hogwartsstudentadmin.edu.hogwarts.service.CourseServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CourseService
@Service public class CourseServiceImpl extends Object implements CourseService
Service class for managing courses.
